page.title: 03EDUCATION
page.content: The children in this 'D' Block go to {Usk C.V Primary School.}It has 286 children and 11 members of staff.The school was opened in Febuary 1985 and took 18 months to build not including the planning. { Glascoed,Langibby}and{Llangwm}were all village schools and they closed because they were too small and would cost too much to repair.Usk school has now closed and now they are all at{Usk {C.V Primary school.} From the age of 11, children go to{Caerleon Comprehensive School.} There are 160 children from the primary school who{travel by coach}or mini bus so the children from the country have a long journey to both primary and secondary school.
